text:
Rosenda Monteros (31 August 1935 – 29 December 2018) was a Mexican actress. She was born in Veracruz. She was best known for her role as Petra in "The Magnificent Seven". She also starred in "A Woman's Devotion" and "Tiara Tahiti".
Monteros died in Mexico City on 29 December 2018 at the age of 83.
